shlok: गतिर्भर्ता प्रभु: साक्षी निवास: शरणं सुहृत् |प्रभव: प्रलय: स्थानं निधानं बीजमव्ययम् || 18||
translation: BG 9.18:I am the Supreme Goal of all living beings, and I am also their Sustainer, Master, Witness, Abode, Shelter, and Friend.  I am the Origin, End, and Resting Place of creation; I am the Repository and Eternal Seed.

shlok: अपि चेत्सुदुराचारो भजते मामनन्यभाक् |साधुरेव स मन्तव्य: सम्यग्व्यवसितो हि स: || 30||
translation: BG 9.30:Even if the vilest sinners worship Me with exclusive devotion, they are to be considered righteous because they have made the proper resolve.

shlok: ओमित्येकाक्षरं ब्रह्म व्याहरन्मामनुस्मरन् |य: प्रयाति त्यजन्देहं स याति परमां गतिम् || 13||
translation: BG 8.13:One who departs from the body while remembering Me, the Supreme Personality, and chanting the syllable Om, will attain the supreme goal.

shlok: गतिर्भर्ता प्रभु: साक्षी निवास: शरणं सुहृत् |प्रभव: प्रलय: स्थानं निधानं बीजमव्ययम् || 18||
translation: BG 9.18:I am the Supreme Goal of all living beings, and I am also their Sustainer, Master, Witness, Abode, Shelter, and Friend.  I am the Origin, End, and Resting Place of creation; I am the Repository and Eternal Seed.

shlok: गतिर्भर्ता प्रभु: साक्षी निवास: शरणं सुहृत् |प्रभव: प्रलय: स्थानं निधानं बीजमव्ययम् || 18||
translation: BG 9.18:I am the Supreme Goal of all living beings, and I am also their Sustainer, Master, Witness, Abode, Shelter, and Friend.  I am the Origin, End, and Resting Place of creation; I am the Repository and Eternal Seed.
